#Issue: 1509

# export
! exec hof export
cmp stderr expect-stderr1
cmp stdout expect-stdout1

# eval
exec hof eval
cmp stderr expect-stderr2
cmp stdout expect-stdout2

-- x.cue --
package x

import "list"

x: [1, 2, 3]
sortedx: list.Sort(x, cmp)

cmp: {}

-- expect-stdout1 --
-- expect-stderr1 --
sortedx: error in call to list.Sort: field not found: less:
    ./x.cue:6:10
-- expect-stdout2 --
import "list"

x: [1, 2, 3]
sortedx: list.Sort(x, cmp)
cmp: {}
-- expect-stderr2 --
